name: DeadLine (itch) (José Castanheira)
description:
You are a student. You have to study for all the tests and not let depression and tiredness overcome you. Be ready before each deadline. Press f4 for fullscreen.

This was my game for the #asylumjam in 2014. Ironically, I was experiencing short deadlines on school and other projects, so I only finished it two days later. However, it was all done in less than 48h total, so I guess it still counts as a jam game!
